maqras.text: Ware wa, anata no mune o hirogenakatta ka
Anata kara omoni o kudashitade wanai ka
Sore wa, anata no senaka o oshitsukete ita
Mata ware wa, anata no meisei o takametade wanai ka
Hontōni kon'nan to tomoni, anraku wa ari
hontōni kon'nan to tomoni, anraku wa aru
Sore de (tōmen no tsutome kara) raku ni nattara, sarani rōku shite
(tada hitosuji ni) anata no omo ni keitō suruga ī
Ichijiku to orību ni oite
shinaizan ni oite
mata heian'na kono machi ni oite (chikau)
Hontōni ware wa, ningen o mottomo utsukushī sugata ni tsukutta
Sorekara ware wa, kare o mottomo hikuku sageta
Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra ni taishite wa hateshinai hōshō ga arou
Naze sore demo, omae wa shūkyō (shinjitsu) o hitei suru no ka
Arrā wa, mottomo sugureta shinpan-shade wanai ka
Yome,`sōzō nasa reru okata, anata no omo no o nanioite
Ichi gyōketsu kara, ningen o tsukura reta
Yome,`anata no omo wa, saikō no sonki de arare
hitsu ni yotte (kaku koto o) oshie rareta okata
Ningen ni michi naru koto o oshie rareta okatadearu
Iya, ningen wa hontōni hōgaide
jibun de nani mo tarinai tokoro wa nai to kangaete iru
Hontōni anata no omo ni (subete no mono wa) kisa reru nodearu
Anata wa, soshi suru mono o mita ka
hitori no shimo be (muhanmado) ga, reihai o sasageru toki ni
Anata wa, kare (soshi suru mono) ga,(tadashī michi) ni michibika rete iru to omou no ka
Keishin o susumete iru ka
(shinri o) usodearu to shite se o muketa to omou no ka
Kare wa, arrā ga mite ora reru koto o shiranai no ka
Danjite sōde wanai. Moshi kare ga tome nainaraba, ware wa maegami de kare o toraerudearou
uso-tsuki de, tsumibukai maegami o
Soshite kare no (kyūjo no tame ni) ichimi o shōshū sa se nasai
Ware wa kanshu (no tenshi) o shōshū surudearou
Danjite sō arubekide wanai. Anata wa kare ni shitagatte wa naranai. Ichizu ni sajida shite (omoni) chikadzuke. 〔Sajida〕
hontōni ware wa, mītsu no yoru ni, kono (kuruān) o kudashita
Mītsu no yoru ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
Mītsu no yoru wa, sen tsuki yori mo masaru
(Sono yoru) tenshi-tachi to seirei wa,-nushi no yurushi no moto ni, subete no kami inochi o motarashite kudaru
Akatsuki no akeru made,(soreha) heiandearu
Keiten'notami no naka (shinri o) kyohi shita mono mo tashinkyō to mo, kare-ra ni meishō ga kuru made,(-dō kara) hanareyou to shinakatta
Mata arrā kara no shito ga, jun Seina shokan o, yonde kika seru made wa
Sono nakaniha, fumetsu no tadashī kiroku (okite) ga aru
Keiten o sazukatte iru-sha-tachi ga, bunpa shita no wa, meishō ga kare-ra ni kite kara ato no kotodeatta

Kare-ra no meiji rareta koto wa, tada arrā ni tsukae, kare ni shinjin no makoto o tsukushi, junsei ni fukujū, kie shite, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o shi nasai to, iu dake no kotodeatta. Kore koso shinsei no oshiedearu
Keiten'notami no naka (shinri o) kyohi shita mono mo, tashinkyō to mo, jigoku no hi ni (nagekoma re)te, sono naka ni eien ni sumu. Korera wa, shujō no naka saiaku no monodearu
Daga shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu-sha-tachi, korera wa, shujō no naka saizen no monodearu

Kare-ra e no hōshō wa,-nushi no omoto no, kawa ga shita o nagareru eien no endearu. Eien ni sono naka ni sumudearou. Arrā wa kare-ra o yorokoba re, kare-ra mo kare ni man'etsu suru. Sore wa omo o osoreru mono (e no hōshō)dearu
Daichi ga hageshiku yure
daichi ga sono omoni o nagedashi
kare (daichi) ni nanigoto ga okotta no ka.' To hito ga iu toki
Sonohi (daichi wa) subete no shōsoku o katarou
anata no omo ga keiji sa reta koto o
Sonohi, hitobito wa bunbetsu sa reta shūdan to natte (chichū kara) susumidete, kare-ra no okonatta koto ga shimesa rerudearou
Ichimijin no omo-sa demo, zen o okonatta mono wa sore o miru
Ichimijin no omo-sa demo, aku o okonatta mono wa sore o miru
Hakuiki araku shingeki suru (uma) ni oite (chikau)
Hidzume ni hibana o chirashi
akatsuki ni kyūshū shite
sajin o makiage
(teki no) gunzei no mattadanaka ni totsunyū suru toki
Hontōni ningen wa, jibun no omo ni taishi onshirazudearu
Sore ni tsuki, kare wa makotoni shōnindeari
mata tomi o aisuru koto ni netchū suru
